005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatTypes;
009
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.AbstractDataTypeAdapter;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateTimeItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
014
015import java.time.DateTimeException;
016import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
017import java.time.format.DateTimeParseException;
018import java.util.List;
019
020import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
021
022import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
023
024public class DateTimeWithTZAdapter
025    extends AbstractDataTypeAdapter<ZonedDateTime, IDateTimeItem> {
026  @NonNull
027  private static final List<QName> NAMES = ObjectUtils.notNull(
028      List.of(
029          new QName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH.toASCIIString(), "date-time-with-timezone"),
030          // for backwards compatibility with original type name
031          new QName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH.toASCIIString(), "dateTime-with-timezone")));
032
033  DateTimeWithTZAdapter() {
034    super(ZonedDateTime.class);
035  }
036
037  @Override
038  public List<QName> getNames() {
039    return NAMES;
040  }
041
042  @Override
043  public JsonFormatTypes getJsonRawType() {
044    return JsonFormatTypes.STRING;
045  }
046
047  @SuppressWarnings("null")
048  @Override
049  public ZonedDateTime parse(String value) {
050    try {
051      return ZonedDateTime.from(DateFormats.DATE_TIME_WITH_TZ.parse(value));
052    } catch (DateTimeParseException ex) {
053      throw new IllegalArgumentException(ex.getLocalizedMessage(), ex);
054    }
055  }
056
057  @SuppressWarnings("null")
058  @Override
059  public String asString(Object value) {
060    try {
061      return DateFormats.DATE_TIME_WITH_TZ.format((ZonedDateTime) value);
062    } catch (DateTimeException ex) {
063      throw new IllegalArgumentException(
064          String.format("The provided value '%s' cannot be formatted as a date/time value. %s",
065              value.toString(),
066              ex.getMessage()),
067          ex);
068    }
069  }
070
071  @SuppressWarnings("null")
072  @Override
073  public ZonedDateTime copy(Object obj) {
074    return ZonedDateTime.from((ZonedDateTime) obj);
075  }
076
077  @Override
078  public Class<IDateTimeItem> getItemClass() {
079    return IDateTimeItem.class;
080  }
081
082  @Override
083  public IDateTimeItem newItem(Object value) {
084    ZonedDateTime item = toValue(value);
085    return IDateTimeItem.valueOf(item);
086  }
087}
